title: TabSearch
name: tabsearch
description: Search for one or more tabs in the currently opened tabs
author: MetalsKiller64

preferences.name: only_first
preferences.title: show only first match
preferences.description: [set default value] Open only the first matching tab and ignore any other match.

preferences.name: match_case
preferences.title: Case sensitive
preferences.description: [set default value] Whether to ignore case while searching for matches.

preferences.name: use_panel
preferences.title: Use panel for search
preferences.description: When activated a panel will be shown by using the show/hide hotkey.

preferences.name: enable_hotkey_show_hide
preferences.title: Enable show/hide hotkey
preferences.description: Show or hide the toolbar by pressing this hotkey (default=true)

preferences.name: hotkey_show_hide_combo
preferences.title: Define show/hide hotkey
preferences.description: Define keys used for the show/hide hotkey.

preferences.name: enable_hotkey_switching
preferences.title: Enable match switching hotkeys
preferences.description: When enabled, switch between matching tabs by pressing Ctrl+Shift+[left or right arrow key]

preferences.name: hotkey_switch_combo_prev
preferences.title: Define switch hotkey (left)
preferences.description: Define keys used as the hotkey for switching to previous tab.

preferences.name: hotkey_switch_combo_next
preferences.title: Define switch hotkey (right)
preferences.description: Define keys used as the hotkey for switching to next tab.

preferences.name: show_toolbar_on_startup
preferences.title: Show toolbar on startup
preferences.description: Choose whether to show or hide the toolbar after startup. (default=true)

preferences.name: hotkey_info
preferences.title: Hotkey Info
preferences.value: Beispiel: accel-shift-left; Keys: shift, alt, ctrl, arrows(left, right, up, down), pageup, pagedown, meta, accel (nicht erlaubt: accel-Z, accel-C, accel-X, accel-V, accel-Q)

preferences.name: badge_usage
preferences.title: Button-Badge
preferences.description: Choose which info to show over the toolbar button
